Master Musician of the Shaman and Folk Music: Heo Yong-Eop Instrumental Album
(1996)

Heo Yong-Eop is a multi-instrumentalist (taepyeongso, piri, haegeum, daegeum) who has performed frequently with the shaman groups Seoul Saenamgut and Gyeonggi Dodanggut.
